title: EOL and EOS Information
description: A standard schema for representing End-of-Life (EOL) and End-of-Support (EOS) information

productId_t.title: Product ID
productId_t.description: Contains the unique product identifier for the product.

productName_t.title: Product name
productName_t.description: Contains the name of the product.

productVersion_t.title: Product version
productVersion_t.description: Contains the version or release of the product.

schema_t.title: EOL and EOS schema
schema_t.description: Specifies the schema the JSON object must be valid against.

creationTimestamp.title: Timestamp of creation
creationTimestamp.description: Contains the RFC 3339 timestamp when the record was created.

EOLDate.title: End of Life
EOLDate.description: Contains the date after which the product is not longer produced or maintained.

supplierId.title: Supplier ID
supplierId.description: Contains a unique identifier for the supplier or service provider.

supplierName.title: Supplier name
supplierName.description: Contains the name of the supplier or service provider.

replacementProduct.title: Replacement product
replacementProduct.description: Contains information about the recommended replacement product, if applicable.
